name: SFSpeechRecognitionTask
desc: A task object that you use to monitor the speech recognition progress.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Cancels the current speech recognition task.

items.name: var isCancelled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the speech recognition task was canceled.

items.name: func finish()
items.desc: Stops accepting new audio and finishes processing on the audio input that has already been accepted.

items.name: var isFinishing: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether audio input has stopped.

items.name: var state: SFSpeechRecognitionTaskState
items.desc: The current state of the speech recognition task.

items.name: enum SFSpeechRecognitionTaskState
items.desc: The state of the task associated with the recognition request.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: An error object that specifies the error that occurred during a speech recognition task.
